tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProteinSamples (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  experiment_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  project_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ProteinSamples (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name TEXT,
    sample_type TEXT,
    sample_origin TEXT,
    collection_date DATE,
    storage_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    researcher_name TEXT,
    sample_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES ProteinSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE protein_samples (
  sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  sample_description TEXT,
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT current_timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_details (
  experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT NOT NULL,
  experiment_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  experiment_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES protein_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT NOT NULL,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment_details(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProteinSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50),
    date_collected DATE,
    storage_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    result_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES ProteinSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES ExperimentResults(result_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProteinSamples (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, project_id INT NOT NULL, researcher_id INT NOT NULL, collection_date DATE NOT NULL, creation_date DATE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, project_description TEXT, project_lead_id INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Researchers (researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, researcher_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Experiments (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_id INT NOT NULL, project_id INT NOT NULL, researcher_id INT NOT NULL, experiment_date DATE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, experiment_id INT NOT NULL, result_data TEXT, result_date DATE NOT NULL, result_comments TEXT)
